TickerCard.description: A product card that looks like a stock ticker widget.
TickerCard.specs: Border-l-4 border-l-[color] (Green for up, Red for down). Contains mini-chart (sparkline). Price is large and mono.

MarketOverview.description: Hero section showing a live graph of the 'Market Index' (aggregate of all product prices).
MarketOverview.specs: Full width, height 400px. Uses Recharts AreaChart. Dark gradient fill.

CrashBanner.description: Emergency alert banner when a product hits 'Crash Sale' price.
CrashBanner.specs: Fixed top or bottom. Flashing Red background. Scrolling text 'CRASH SALE IMMINENT'.

OrderBook.description: Visual representation of recent purchases (buys) and price drops.
OrderBook.specs: List view. Green text for buys, Red text for price drops.

general: Implement the 'Stock Market' logic visually: Prices must look like they are updating live.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL prices, percentages, and data points.
The background must be #050505 (Obsidian), NOT standard black.
Use the 'TickerCard' component for product listings.
Ensure the 'Crash Sale' indicator is visually aggressive (flashing red).
Do NOT use rounded corners > 4px. Keep it sharp and industrial.
Use 'recharts' for the price history graphs.
Use 'framer-motion' for smooth price transitions (no jumping numbers).

pages.Landing: Hero is 'MarketOverview'. Below is 'Top Gainers' and 'Crash Watch'.
pages.ProductDetail: Large 'Candlestick' or 'Area' chart. 'Buy' button is a 'Trade' button.
pages.Dashboard: Portfolio view. 'Assets Held' instead of 'Order History'.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
